text: Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 southeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Mist at first. Force 2 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Mainly cloudy. Mist later. Light rain later. Force 2 to 3 easterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Mist at first. Light winds, becoming force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Mist in the morning and at night. A few rain patches. Force 2 to 4 south to southeasterly winds.
